name: Traveler's Handy Sword

refinement_effect.refine_one: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.25% HP.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.50% HP.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1.75% HP.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 2% HP.

description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
